title: axe Auditor
creator: Deque Systems, Inc.
description: Axe Auditor (formerly WorldSpace Assure) provides full-coverage, consistent WCAG audits of all content and applications. This step-by-step manual accessibility testing and reporting tool enables functional testers with to create precise, comprehensive and consistent accessibility issue reports.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
<abbr title="Japanese Industry Standard">JIS</abbr>, Japanese industry standard
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
